SA20srabhusu:2771: yo (ye)nāsyābhīkṣṇaṃ vāto vā kupyati, pittamvā, śleṣmamvā, viṣūcikā vā kāye santiṣṭhate /
SA20srabhusu:2774: karmārāmo vā, bhāṣyārāmo vā, nidrārāgaḥ (maḥ), saṃgaṇikārāmaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:2781: yatrāsya vāsa(saṃ)kalpayato divā vāgraviloko (vogro raverāloko) bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:2791: tatra prayogāntarāyo yenāntarāyeṇa samava[hitena] saṃmukhībhūtenāśakto bhavatyapratibalaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ kuśalapakṣaprayoge [/
SA20srabhusu:2793: yadābādhako bhavati, bāḍhaglānaḥ, abhīkṣṇamasya vāto vā kupyate, pittamvā, śleṣmamvā (ṣma vā)
SA20srabhusu:2795: ] api tvasya daśati vṛściko vā, śatapadī vā, manuṣyo vainaṃ viheṭhayatyamanuṣyo vā [/
SA20srabhusu:2796: ] na ca lābhī bhavati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāmayamevaṃbhāgīyaḥ prayogāntarāyo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:2808: styānamiddhaparyavasthitaḥ, kusīdajātīyo nidrāsukhaṃ, pārśvasukhaṃ, śayanasukhaṃ ca svīkaroti /
SA20srabhusu:2826: idamevaṃbhāgīyo (ima evaṃ bhāgīyā) dharmāḥ pravivekāntarāyo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:2827: yaiḥ samavahitaiḥ saṃmukhībhūtairna sukaraṃ bhavatyaraṇyavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanānyadhyāvasituṃ /
SA20srabhusu:2828: araṇyāni vā vṛkṣamūlāni [Śbh_Sh:_147] vā śūnyāgārāṇi vā [/]
SA20srabhusu:2834: yathāsya pramattasya styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanahati /
SA20srabhusu:2849: evamāḍhyakulapravrajitaḥ, adīnaḥ, evamabhirūpo darśanīyaḥ, prāsādika, evaṃ bahuśrutaḥ, sannicayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:2850: evamahamasmin kalyāṇavākyo vākkaraṇenopetaḥ, anye ca bhikṣavo na tatheti /
SA20srabhusu:2861: te cāsya na kālena kālamavivṛtāni ca sthānāni vivṛṇvanti /
SA20srabhusu:2864: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca prajñayā pratividhya saṃprakāśayanti yāvadeva jñānadarśanasya viśuddhaye /
SA20srabhusu:2872: sa ātmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇaṃstāvatā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati nottari vyāyacchate /
SA20srabhusu:2880: yena vipaśyanāṃ na pūrayati na viśodhayatyevamasya cāpalyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:2900: tatra ko dadāti [kasmai dadāti kutra dadāti]kena ca dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:2909: tatra kutra dadāti / āha / caturṣu dadāti / duḥkhitāyoga(pa)kāriṇe / iṣṭāya, viśiṣṭāya ca /
SA20srabhusu:2920: upakāriṇaḥ katame tadyathā mātāpitaraṃ (rau) āpāyakapoṣakaṃ (kau), samvardhakami(kāvi)ti /
SA20srabhusu:2921: ye vā punaraṭavīkāntārāduttārayanti, durbhikṣādvā, paracakrabhayādvā, bandhanādvā /
SA20srabhusu:2928: āpatsu caivaṃ na parityajanti iti ye vā punaranye [a]pyevaṃbhāgīyā ima upakāriṇaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:2932: prema vā, gauravamvā, bhaktivādo vā, ālaptakāḥ, saṃstutakāḥ sapriyakāśca bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:2933: iti vā punaranye [a]pyevaṃbhāgīyā ima ucyate iṣṭāḥ //
SA20srabhusu:2941: ye vā punaranye [a]pyevaṃ bhāgīyā ima ucyante viśiṣṭāḥ //
SA20srabhusu:2942: tatra kiṃ dadātītyāha / samāsataḥ sattvasaṃkhyātamasatva (ttva) saṃkhyātaṃ ca / vastu dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:2947: idamapi puruṣasaṃkhyātaṃ dānaṃ yatra bodhisattvabodhāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
SA20srabhusu:2957: asattvasaṃkhyātamvastu katamat / tadyathā dhanavastu, [Śbh_Sh:_153] dhānyavastu / deśa vastu /
SA20srabhusu:2984: tatra yacca satva (sattva) saṃkhyātamvastu idaṃ dadātīti //
SA20srabhusu:2986: yā ca alobhasahagatā cetanā, cittābhisaṃskāro manaskarma /
SA20srabhusu:2988: vākkarma de[śa]vastuparityāgāya, svasaṃtāne vā [/] anena dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:2996: dharmeṇa, samayena, asāhasena, samudānayitvā (samudānīya) śuci dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:3001: vinīya sātma[yanmalaṃ] sannidhimalaṃ ca dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:3003: datvā vā vipratisārī bhavati / evaṃ dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:3008: yaduta upakāriṣu premṇā, gauraveṇa, bhaktyā dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:3012: ebhirākārairato 'sya gṛhiṇo vā, pravrajitasya vā cittālaṃkārārthaṃ, cittapariṣkārārthaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:3036: satkṛtya, gurukṛtya, mānayitvā, pūjayitvā, niśritya, viharati /
SA20srabhusu:3038: sabrahmacāriṣu, śikṣāyāmavavādānuśāsanyāṃ, pratisaṃstare apramāde, samādhāvevaṃ śrāddho bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3048: jātusukhayā yayāsyāśitapītakhāditāsvāditā[ni] samyakyukhena paripākaṃ gacchantyevamalpābādho bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3052: nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu dakṣaśca bhavatyanalasa utthānasampannaḥ [/
SA20srabhusu:3066: yāvadbhirguṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatyalpecchatāmādiṃ kṛtvā taiḥ parato jñātuṃ na samanveṣate /
SA20srabhusu:3067: kaści(cci)nme(nmāṃ) pare na jānīyuḥ, alpeccha[ṃ] iti vā evaṃ guṇayukta ityevamalpecho bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3078: yathā cīvaramevaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ (taḥ), śayanāsanamevaṃ tuṣṭo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3081: na tu pare tadyathā dārakā vā, manuṣyā veti /
SA20srabhusu:3082: ye vā punaranye [a]pi kecidyeṣāmarthāya yā (yā ya)mparyeṣṭimāpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:3085: kathaṃ subharo bhavati / alpenāpi yāpayati / lūhenāpi yāpayatyevaṃ subharo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3100: no tu uccaiḥ śuṇḍāṃ praṇidhāya kulāni upasaṃkrāmati /
SA20srabhusu:3101: ato [a]haṃ lapsye, praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ, bhojanīyaṃ, yāvadāptaṃ [/
SA20srabhusu:3113: yataśca punarjānīte na me ata uttari bhojanena kṛtyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
SA20srabhusu:3118: tribhiśca cīvarairyāpayati, sāṃghāṭinā vā, uttarāsaṃgena, aṃtarvāsena ca /
SA20srabhusu:3119: trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇāmatirekamuttaraṃ na dhārayatyevaṃ trai[cīva]riko bhavati //
SA20srabhusu:3154: śmaśāne vāsaṃ kalpayati yatra mṛtamṛto janakāyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3157: maṃce vā, pīṭhe vā, tṛṇasaṃstare vā niṣadyayā kālamatināmayati /
SA20srabhusu:3160: vṛkṣamūlamvā, tṛṇasaṃstaramvā,parṇasaṃstaramvā, niśritya pṛṣṭha vā (pṛṣṭhaṃ vā)
SA20srabhusu:3163: yasmin tṛṇasaṃstare vā, parṇasaṃstare vā śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhusu:3168: kenaite dhutaguṇā ucyante tadyathā ūrṇā vā, karpāsaṃ vā, dhutaṃ bhavatyasaṃvṛttamiti /
SA20srabhusu:3169: ta[cca ta]smin [Śbh_Sh:_161] samaye mṛdu ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3170: laghu ca, karmaṇyaṃ ca, yaduta sūtrābhinirhāre vā, tūlāvahade (te?) (tūlābhinirhāre) vā [/
SA20srabhusu:3171: ] evameva ihaikatyasya piṇḍapātarāgeṇa piṇḍapāte cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3172: saṃsaktaṃ cīvararāgeṇa śayanāsanarā[geṇa] śayanāsane cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3175: mṛdukarmaṇyamārjavamāsravamvidheyaṃ yaduta brahmacaryavāsāya tenocyante dhutaguṇā iti //
SA20srabhusu:3189: api ca śmāśānikatvaṃ middhena rāgasya prahāṇāya bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3191: āstaraṇapratyāstaraṇopacchāda[na]rāgasya prahāṇāya yāthāsāṃstariko bhavatyevaṃ dhutaguṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3198: yaduta cīvara piṇḍapāta śayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraistatra pratigra[heṇa] mātrāṃ jānāti /
SA20srabhusu:3206: anyatamānyatamasya vā jñānamātrasya darśanamātrakasparśavihāra sārthakasya lābhī sannetenātmānamutkarṣayati /
SA20srabhusu:3212: durbhāṣitabhāṣī, duṣkṛtakarmakārī, paṇḍitaḥ punaḥ sucintitacintī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3231: yathāpi tanmaitreṇa kāya karmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3256: na sa māropikayā mithyādṛṣṭyā samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3264: [na te]na dayate, na tena prīyate, tena cātmadaṃ [vā]nyī (cī)varaṃ dhārayati /
SA20srabhusu:3271: sāme tato nidānaṃ bhaviṣyatyanekaparyāyeṇa vyākṣepād vyāpāro vā,
SA20srabhusu:3275: sā (tan) me ato nidānamutpadyate dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ, sāmparāyikaṃ veti /
SA20srabhusu:3286: itikaraṇīyeṣu ca dakṣo bhavatyanalasaḥ, svayaṃkārī, na parataḥ kāyaparicaryāṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:3287: buddhānāṃ ca buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca, acintyamanubhāvaṃ, gaṃbhīrāṃ ca deśanāmadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:3290: dṛṣṭvā na ca svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśasthāyī bhavatyasamaṃjasagrāhī, duḥpratiniḥsargamaṃntrī [/
SA20srabhusu:3300: tadyathā harṣairvā, keyūrairvā, aṃgulimudrikayā vā, jātarūparajatamālayā [Śbh_Sh:_166] [vā /
SA20srabhusu:3310: śraddhā aśaṭhaḥ alpābādhavīrya prajñā alpecchatā saṃtuṣṭiḥ supoṣatā [//]
SA20srabhusu:3317: laukikaṃ caiva vairāgyaṃ tathā lokottareṇa ca /
SA20srabhusu:3319: tatra kati pudgalā yesyāṃ naiṣkramyabhūmau yathādeśitāyāṃ yathāparikīrttitāyāṃ niṣkrāmanti /
SA20srabhusu:3378: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu rāga āsevito,
SA20srabhusu:3380: bahulīkṛtaḥ sa tena hetunā tena pratyayainaitarhi raṃjanīye vastuni tīvrarāgaśca,
SA20srabhusu:3385: yena pudgalena dveṣaḥ pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu āsevito, bhāvito, bahulīkṛtaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3386: tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi dveṣaṇīye vastuni tīvradveṣaśca bhavatyāyatadveṣaśca /
SA20srabhusu:3390: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu moha āsevito, bhāvito, bahulīkṛtaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3392: ] etarhi mohanīye vastuni tīvramohaśca bhavatyāyata mohaścāyamucyate mohonmadaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3394: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu māna āsevito, bhāvito, bahulīkṛtastena hetunā tena pratyayena [/
SA20srabhusu:3398: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu vitarka āsevito,
SA20srabhusu:3400: bahulīkṛtastena ca hetunā tena ca pratyayena etarhi vitarka sthānīye vastuni tīvravitarkaśca bhavatyāyatavitarkaśca [/
SA20srabhusu:3413: tena ca pratyayena raṃjanīye vā vastuni,
SA20srabhusu:3418: na cāsya samudācarati rāgo, yaduta tena vastunā [/
SA20srabhusu:3419: ] yathā rāga evaṃ dveṣo, moho, māno, vitarkaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3422: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu na rāga āsevito bhavati, bahulīkṛtaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3425: sa tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi raṃjanīye vastuni samavahite,
SA20srabhusu:3431: yathā rāga evaṃ dveṣo, moho, māno, vitarkā(rko), veditavyāḥ (vyaḥ) /
SA20srabhusu:3457: yatpu(yaḥ pu)dgalo yathāśruteṣu dharmeṣu, paryavāpteṣu, cintiteṣu /
SA20srabhusu:3470: ] sa eva dharmānusārī pudgalo yasmin samaye śrāmaṇyaphalamadhigacchati /
SA20srabhusu:3479: na ca sarveṇa sarvamāsravakṣayamanuprāpnotyayamucyate kāyasākṣī pudgalaḥ //
SA20srabhusu:3486: saptakṛtvā devāṃśca, manuṣyāṃśca, [Śbh_Sh:_178] saṃbādhya, saṃsṛtya duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:3489: yasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ pudgalasya anāgāmiphalapratipannakasya kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāmadhimātramadhyadeśāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:3510: ta ime trayo 'ntarābhavaparinirvāyiṇaḥ pudgalāḥ ekatyamabhi saṃkṣipya antarāparinirvāyī pudgala ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:3511: upapadyaparinirvāyī pudgalaḥ katamaḥ / ya upapannamātra eva parinirvāti //
SA20srabhusu:3516: yobhisaṃskāreṇa prayatnena khedamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya tatropapannaḥ parinirvātyayamucyate sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pudgalaḥ //
SA20srabhusu:3519: [Śbh_Sh:_182] prathame dhyāne upapannaḥ sa na tatrastha eva parinirvāti /
SA20srabhusu:3526: yo mṛdvindviyagātraḥ (gotraḥ) pudgalaḥ laukikebhyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihīyate /
SA20srabhusu:3529: yaduta etāmeva parihāṇimadhipatiṃ kṛtvā tanmātro vāsya kuśalapakṣo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3530: no tu teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātriṃdivasānāṃ kṣaṇalavamuhūrttānā (ṇā)matyayādatyarthaṃ viśeṣāya paraiti /
SA20srabhusu:3534: akopyadharmā pudgalaḥ katamaḥ / etadviparyayeṇā [ko] 'pyadharmā pudgalo veditavyaḥ //
SA20srabhusu:3537: no tvaṣṭau vimokṣān kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasampadya viharati /
SA20srabhusu:3550: samāpattiprabhedena upapattiprabhedena parihāṇi prabhedenā varaṇaprabhedena ca //
SA20srabhusu:3553: bhikṣu[r]bhikṣuṇī, śikṣamāṇā [śrāmaṇeraḥ] śrāmaṇerī upāsaka upāsikā ca //
SA20srabhusu:3564: iha rāgacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ parītte sarvanihīne raṃjanīye vastuni ghanamadhimātraṃ rāgaparyavasthānamutpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:3572: nātyarthaṃ pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo yaduta kāyena, vācā durvivejyaśca bhavati, duḥsaṃvejyaśca /
SA20srabhusu:3580: smitapūrvaṃgama ityevaṃbhāgīyāni rāgacāritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:3592: kharendriyaḥ, karkaśendriyaḥ paruṣendriyaśca bhavatyatyarthaṃ pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3616: prāgeva madhyādhimātre, dṛḍhaṃ ca kālaṃ tasya mohaparyavasthānasya santatimavasthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:3631: parahāyaḥ parapraṇeya ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni mohacaritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni //
SA20srabhusu:3633: iha mānacaritaḥ pudgalo mānasthānīye vastuni parīttepi ghanaṃ mānaparyavasthānamutpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:3638: ] iha mānacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ mānasthānīye vastuni parīttepighanaṃ mānaparyavasthānamutpādayati kaḥ punarvādo madhyādhimātre /
SA20srabhusu:3642: uddhatendriyaśca bhavatyunnatendriyaśco[nnatendriyaśca] kāyamaṇḍanānuyuktaśca bhavatyadhimātramunnatāñca vācaṃ bhāṣate,
SA20srabhusu:3644: sātāpikagurusthānīyānāṃ ca na kālena kālaṃ yathārūpāmapacitiṃ kartā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3653: upanāhī cetyevaṃbhāgīyāni mānacaritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni //
SA20srabhusu:3655: iha vitarkacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ vitarka sthānīye vastuni parīttepi ghanaparyavasthānamutpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:3674: ] dakṣonalasa ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni vitarkacaritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni //
SA20srabhusu:3683: tatrayoyaṃ pudgalaḥ pratyekāyāṃ bodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ so 'pi syātpratyekabuddhagotraḥ,
SA20srabhusu:3686: ] tatra yoyaṃ pudgalo mahāyāne kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ so 'pi syāchrāvakagotraḥ,
SA20srabhusu:3699: eṣāṃ yathoddiṣṭānāṃ yathāparikīrttitānāṃ pudgalānāṃ catasṛbhiḥ pratipadbhirniryāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3703: asti pratipatsukhā dhandhābhijñā asti pratipatsukhā kṣiprābhijñā //
SA20srabhusu:3704: tasya mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate duḥkhā dhandhābhijñā /
SA20srabhusu:3705: tatra tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā /
SA20srabhusu:3706: tatra mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate sukhā dhandhābhijñā /
SA20srabhusu:3707: tatra tīkṣṇendrisya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate sukhā kṣiprābhijñā /
SA20srabhusu:3711: caturṇāṃ pratipannakānāṃ strota āpattiphalapratipannakasya sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakasya anāgāmiphalapratipannakasya, arhatta(arhattva)
SA20srabhusu:3712: phalapratipannakasya, caturṇāṃ phalasthānāṃ srota āpannasya, sakṛdāgāminaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3719: sa śraddhānusārī, yo dharmeṣu parapratyayavinayānusāreṇa prayuktaḥ sa dharmānusārī /
SA20srabhusu:3722: tadyathā kāyasākṣiṇaḥ (sākṣī) aṣṭau vimokṣān kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasampadya viharati /

SA20srabhusu:7279: ye tāvadatītamadhvānamupādāya sukhakāmāḥ sattvāḥ te atītāḥ,
SA20srabhusu:7282: yāvadanāgatādadhvano nityakālaṃ sukhino bhavanti (ntī) tyevaṃ maitryā(ḥ)kālaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:7284: nāsti kaścidātmā vā, sattvo vā ya eṣa sukhakāmo vā syāt /
SA20srabhusu:7286: api tu skandhamātrametat saṃskāramātrakametadyatraiṣā saṃjñā saṃjñaptirvyavahāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7287: te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ karmakleśahetukā ityevamapekṣāyuktyā maitrīmparyeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:7288: prasiddhadharmatā khalveṣā [a]cintyadharmatā yanmaitrīvyāpādabhāvanā prahāṇāya samvarttata ityevaṃ dharmatāyuktyā maitrīmparyeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:7290: tatra kathamidaṃ pratyayatā pratītyasamutpādālambanā vipaśyanāprayuktārthaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:7291: tadadhipateyaṃ dharmamadhimatiṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādātte te dharmā utpadyante,
SA20srabhusu:7292: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhātte te dharmā nirudhyante [/
SA20srabhusu:7304: pūrvānte ajñānamiti vistareṇa yathā pratītyasamutpādavibhaṃge evaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate [/
SA20srabhusu:7307: evaṃ pratītyasamutpannāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarva ete abhūtvā bhāvād,
SA20srabhusu:7312: yo (ya) eṣvanityeṣu duḥkhaśūnyānātmakeṣu saṃskāreṣu yathābhūtaṃ pratisammohaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7320: yaḥ karttā vā pratisaṃvedako vā syānnānyatra dharmasaṃketāt /
SA20srabhusu:7321: teṣvevāvidyāpratyayeṣu [Śbh_Sh_384] saṃskāreṣu yāvajjātipratyaye jarāmaraṇe saṃjñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ kārako vedaka ityevaṃ nāmā,
SA20srabhusu:7345: yadbalena yatsāṃmukhyena tatkarma vipākadānadāna samarthaṃ bhavatyayamabhinirvṛttihetuḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7346: imaṃ ca dvividhaṃ hetumadhipatiṃ kṛtvā evaṃ asya trividhaḥ duḥkhatānupakṣasya kevalasyāsya duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatīti /
SA20srabhusu:7363: iti yaḥ piṇḍasaṃjñino dhātunānātvaṃ ajānānasyā[ne]na kāyena nānādhātukena unnatirmanya (nvā)
SA20srabhusu:7364: nā maraṇa eṣa dharmaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣyaḥ viparyayācchuklapakṣya ityeva[ṃ] pakṣaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:7368: kāṣṭhamvā cākāśaṃ parivāritamagāro [a]gāra iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatyevameva ṣaḍdhātūnupādāya /
SA20srabhusu:7370: tvaṅmānsa(māṃsa) śoṇitaṃ cākāśe parivārite saṃjñā prajñaptirvyavahāro bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7374: āptāgamopyeṣa pratyātmajñānamanumānikopyeṣa vidhiḥ prasiddhadharmatācintyadharmatetyevaṃ kāryakāraṇayuktimupapattisānayuktiṃ dharmatāyuktiṃ ca paryeṣate //
SA20srabhusu:7383: ] amī dīrghā āśvāsapraśvāsā, amī hrasvā imānsarvakāyena pratisaṃvedayāmi /
SA20srabhusu:7389: jīvitendriyamayaṃ ca kāyaḥ savijñānaka ityanityā āśvāsapraśvāsā mahāśravaṇetyevaṃ (ṇā ityevaṃ)
SA20srabhusu:7397: nānyatra kaścidya āśvasiti praśvasiti vā asya caite āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7398: api tu hetusamutpanneṣu, pratītyasamutpanneṣu saṃskāreṣviyaṃ saṃjñā /
SA20srabhusu:7403: evaṃ caritaviśodhanenālambanena ṣaḍvastūni paryeṣya, adhyātmaṃ cittaṃ punaḥ punaḥ śamayataḥ (yan)
SA20srabhusu:7412: ) prayogastadviparyayeṇa [Śbh_Sh_389] ca nava vidhaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣasaṃgṛhīto yoginā veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7420: anayā navavidhayā śuklapakṣasaṃgṛhītayā tvaritatvaritaṃ cittaṃ samādhīyate /
SA20srabhusu:7422: yāvatī cānena bhūmirgantavyā bhavatyanuprāptavyā tāṃ laghu laghvevāgantā bhavatyadhandhāyamānaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7431: samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaskaḥ punaḥ yatrālambane priyārohatā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7435: abhyāso 'nena kṛto bhavati yo antataḥ parītto 'pi na [Śbh_Sh_390] sarveṇa sarvamādikarmika eva bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7436: tathā hyādikarmikasyānurūpe 'pyālambane na prayuktasya nivāraṇāni nābhīkṣṇaṃ samudācarita(ranti) /
SA20srabhusu:7446: sāmīcīkarmaṇo vā anyasyaivaṃbhāgīyasyetikaraṇaṃ yasyārthāya sa tannimnena cetasā tatpravaṇena tatprāstāreṇa (bhāreṇa) ca sarvaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:7447: laghulaghveva ca kṛtvā, pariprāpya, punareva prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:7448: niyamya pratisaṃlayanāya sa cedbhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsaka kṣatriyabrāhmaṇaparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchati /
SA20srabhusu:7456: bahavo me pratyayā maraṇasya- vāto vā me kupyeta, pittamvā, śleṣmamvā(śleṣma vā)
SA20srabhusu:7457: , bhuktaṃ vā viṣamyeta, yena me viṣūcikā kāye santiṣṭheta /
SA20srabhusu:7460: ] manuṣyādapi me bhayamityetāni sthānāni nityakālasya [Śbh_Sh_391] na- karotyapramattaśca viharatyevaṃ ca punarapramatto vihara[ti /
SA20srabhusu:7461: ] api bata jīveyaṃ saptāhaṃ ṣaṭ pañcacatustridvire (dvaye)
SA20srabhusu:7465: yāvacca jīveyaṃ tāvadyogamanasikāreṇa śāstuḥ śāsane yogamāpadyeyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7466: ya i(di)yatā mayā bahukṛtyaṃ syādyaduta śāstuḥ śāsane itīyamaśithilaprayogatā /
SA20srabhusu:7473: ] vipaśyanāṃ vipaśyanānimittaṃ vipaśyanākālaṃ, pragrahaṃ pragrahanimittaṃ, pragrahakālaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7484: yenālambanena taccittaṃ śamayati, śamathaparibhāvite cetasi uttaratra śamathasya pāriśuddhaye /
SA20srabhusu:7488: uddhate citte ūrdhvamvābhiśaṃkini śamathasya kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:7489: tathā vipaśyanāparibhāvite citte iti karaṇīyavyākṣepopahate śamathakālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:7492: tatrālambananimittaṃ vipaśyanānimittaṃ [śamatha]pakṣyaṃ jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ pratibimbamālambananimittaṃ yenālambanena prajñāṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20srabhusu:7493: tatra nidānanimittaṃ vipaśyanāparibhāvite cetasi uttaratra vipaśyanāpariśuddhaye cetaḥ śamathabimbayogaḥ [/]
SA20srabhusu:7494: tatra vipaśyanākālaḥ śamathaparibhāvite cetasi ādita eva cājñeyavastuyathābhūtāvabodhāya vipaśyanāyāḥ kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:7497: ] tatra pragrahanimittaṃ yena ca prasadanīyenālambanena nimittena cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti /
SA20srabhusu:7498: yasya vīryārambhaḥ tadānulomikastatra pragrahakālaḥ līnaṃ cittaṃ līnatvābhiśaṃkini pragrahasya kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:7525: na ca śiśumudāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā nimittagrāhī bhavatyanuvyaṃjanagrāhī,
SA20srabhusu:7544: tatra navākāracittasthityā vipaśyanā pūrvaṃgamayā adhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7552: vyāpya tadālambanaṃ vibhāvanālakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitamasmiṃstvarthe adhyātmaṃ nimittābhisaṃkṣepataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7563: tathā prayukta utpannotpanneṣu sarvabāhyanimitteṣu asmṛtyamanasikāraṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:7565: sa tatra yogaṃ kurvan pratigṛhṇāti, sa nirmimitte cālambane savikalpamaśubhādike carati /
SA20srabhusu:7571: tena tadālambanaṃ tasminsamaye muktaṃ bhavati, nodgṛhītaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7590: tadyathā citrakaraścitrakarāntevāsī vā tatprathamaścitrakarmaṇi prayuktaḥ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:7591: sa ācāryasyāntikācchikṣāpūrvagamaṃ rūpakamādāya dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭavā pratirūpakaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:7594: ya yathā yathā bhaṅktyā bhaṅktyā karoti /
SA20srabhusu:7595: tathā tathāsyottaraṃ rūpakaṃ pariśuddhataraṃ paryavadātataraṃ khyāti /
SA20srabhusu:7599: na janvandhasya tadrūpakapariśuddhiṃ nigacchedevamihāpi nayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7610: tatra rūpiṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yannimittaṃ pratibimbaṃ, pratibhāsaṃ(saḥ)
SA20srabhusu:7614: saiṣā navavidhā śuklapakṣyā śamathavipaśyanānulomā prayogatā veditavyā /
SA20srabhusu:7619: caturbhiḥ kāraṇairevaṃ samyakprayukto yogī āvaraṇe svañcittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:7626: tatra paritamanā yā naiṣkramyaprāvivekyaprayuktasya kliṣṭā utkaṇṭhā, aratiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7635: ahamasmi lābhī, anye ca na tatheti /
SA20srabhusu:7646: svātmasaṃpragrahasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣvayoniśomanasikāro bahulīkāranivaraṇavitarkasaṃpragrahāṇāṃ nidānaṃ [Śbh_Sh_400] yadaśubhatāmamanasi kṛtya śubhatāṃ manasikarotyayamatrāyoniśaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7656: asminnāvaraṇe sati saṃvidyamāne caturvidhepyanadhigataṃ nādhigatāt parihīyate /
SA20srabhusu:7658: saṃkliṣṭavihārī ca bhavati, duḥkhavihārī ca bhavatyātmā caitamavavadati /
SA20srabhusu:7660: kāyasya ca bhedāt paraṃ maraṇādapāyeṣūpapadyate / ayamatrādīnavaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7673: pūrvaṃ me (mayā)vivekābhyāso na kṛto, yena me etarhi vivekaprayuktasya paritamanā utpadyate [/
SA20srabhusu:7674: ] sa cedetarhi na kariṣyāmyabhyāsaḥ (saṃ) evamāyati[ḥ] punarbhava evaṃrūpo bhaviṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:7677: tatra svabhāvaṃ parijñāya āvaraṇataḥ, saṃkleśataḥ, tāvacchamathabāhulyaṃ [/
SA20srabhusu:7682: aparivarjanācca punarasya parivarjanīyasya ko doṣa ityata ādīnavaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:7683: parivarjitasya cāyatyāṃ kathamanutpādo bhavatītyataḥ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatyevamanenāvaraṇebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhitaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7686: yaduta ebhireva tribhirmukhaiḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vastūnāmekaikaśyā (syā a)
SA20srabhusu:7688: yathā ca yathā vipaśyanā samyakprayuktasya pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ (vipulatāṃ)
SA20srabhusu:7696: yathā cittaikāgratā vivardhate tathā tathā kāyaḥ praśrabhyate,
SA20srabhusu:7698: ityetau dvau dharmāvanyonyaṃ nirvṛtāvanyonyaṃ pratibaddhoyaduta cittaikāgratā,
SA20srabhusu:7702: [Śbh_Sh_403] peyālaṃ ataścāsya yoginaḥ aśubhāprayogasyāsevanānvayāt bhāvanānvayādbahulīkārānvayāccarato vā,
SA20srabhusu:7705: yathāpi tatsubhāvitatvādaśubhāyāḥ kāmarāgasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ [na] praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:7710: yoginānuprāpto (ptaṃ)me, aśubhāprāptaṃ me, bhāvanāphalamiyatā aśubhā pratilabdhā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7717: vyāpādasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7721: na nityasukhasattvāya dṛṣṭisahagataṃ sammohanimittaṃ mohaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu /
SA20srabhusu:7724: na tveva pi (ci)ttasaṃjñā, mānaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7728: na tveva prapañcasaṃjñā vitarkaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7729: tatra niyatā(taṃ)śamathaśca vipaśyanā cobhe mitrībhūte samayugamvarttete /
SA20srabhusu:7732: yo lābhī bhavati navākārāyāṃ [Śbh_Sh_405] cittasthitau navamasyākārasya yaduta samāhitatāyāḥ [/
SA20srabhusu:7740: yathaiva śamathamāsate [te] nocyate śamathaścāsyavipaśyanā cobhe mitrībhūte samayugamvarttete /
SA20srabhusu:7743: arthatastu lakṣaṇauḥ pacchaiḥ (pakṣaiḥ) kālaiśca saha yuktibhiḥ //
SA20srabhusu:7747: samyak prayogatā caiva navādhārā dvidhā matā /
SA20srabhusu:7751: ] āhādikarmikastatprathamakarmika evaṃ vyāpini lakṣaṇe vyavasthāpite ekāgratāyāmā (ā)
SA20srabhusu:7754: sa tatprathamata ekāgratāṃ prahāṇābhiratiṃ cādhigamiṣyāmīti caturbhirmanaskāraiḥ prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:7762: saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyayaṃ cittasantāpano manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7768: yenāyaṃ manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittaṃ samvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvejayitvā (saṃvejya)
SA20srabhusu:7771: nirvikalpakatāyāmevaṃ sthāpayatyekāgrāṃ smṛtiṃ pravarttayati yenāsya hetunā,
SA20srabhusu:7775: yena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittena tathādhyātmaṃ saṃśayamiti (saṃśamayati)
SA20srabhusu:7776: tena punaḥ punarabhīkṣṇaṃ adhiprajñaṃ dharmavipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:7779: katamaḥ kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyevamasya taccittaṃ taptaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7787: vartamāne samavahite saṃmukhībhūte yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7790: abhyatīte kṣaṇe niruddhe vigate vipariṇate yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ [Śbh_Sh_408] sthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7793: evamasya taccittaṃ snigdhaṃ bhavatyārdraṃ ca, dravañcācchaṃ ca, prasannaṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:7799: sa evaṃ ratnānyanusaraṃścittamabhipramodayati lābhā me sulabdhāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7801: lābhā me sulabdhā yo (a)haṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7803: yasya me sabrahmacāriṇaḥ śīlavanto guṇavantaḥ peśalāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7809: lābhā me sulabdhā[ḥ] so [a]haṃ śāstari tathāgate [a]rhati samyaksaṃbuddhe,
SA20srabhusu:7819: ebhiḥ sabrahmacāribhiḥ śīlasāmānyagato, dṛṣṭisāmānyagataḥ, sadbhiḥ sāmānyagataiḥ (samyaggataiḥ)
SA20srabhusu:7828: yadanena pūrveṇāparamārabdhavīryeṇa viharatā viśeṣādhigamaḥ kṛto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7837: yaduta saṃvegapraharṣābhyāṃ yataścittamevaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣa vimukhaṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:7839: abhiṣyandanīyena manaskāreṇa kālena kālamadhyātmaṃ ca pradadhāti /
SA20srabhusu:7840: yaduta cetaḥśamathena praśrabdhijanakena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinoti /
SA20srabhusu:7850: karmā[rā]ntevāsinā vā kālena kālaṃ yadā saṃtāpitaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7853: tamenaṃ dakṣaḥ karmāro vā, karmā[rā]ntevāsī vā tadupamena śilpajñānena karmāntavastunā yatreṣṭā(ma)
SA20srabhusu:7855: meva yoginā yadā taccittamabhidhyādimalakaṣāye vimukhībhāvenodvejitaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7858: śamathapakṣe vā vipaśyanāpakṣe vā tatra tatra sūpaśliṣṭaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7867: kāraṇāni niśritya yaduta dṛṣṭamvā śrutamvā, cintānumānādhipateyaṃ vā /
SA20srabhusu:7870: ] sa cetsa yogaprayukta ādikarmiko rāgacarito bhavatyaśubhāvineyaḥ kathaṃ sa pañcānāṃ nimittānāmudgrahaṇāyā[va]bodhyate /
SA20srabhusu:7874: sa cedanyatra grāme, nigame vānyatamaṃ puruṣamvā, striyamvā ābādhikaṃ śrṛṇoṣi /
SA20srabhusu:7887: grāmanigame, no ca tasminneva grāmanigame, na pareṣāma (raira)
SA20srabhusu:7890: sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā caivaṃ cittaṃ saṃvejaya /
SA20srabhusu:7891: duḥkho batāyaṃ saṃsāraḥ, kṛcchra ātmabhāvapratilabdho yatremā evaṃ rūpātmamaśca (rūpā ātmanaśca)
SA20srabhusu:7896: dṛṣṭivipattirapi yato nidānaṃ sattvā dṛṣṭe ca dharme duḥkhavihāriṇo bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:7905: sādhu ca, [Śbh_Sh_413] suṣṭhu ca, yoniśaḥ pradadhatsva /
SA20srabhusu:7914: kaṭukamanālāpamalabhyametatsthānaṃ tasmādetatsarvārthamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahāṇaratiratena me bhavitavyamapramattena,
SA20srabhusu:7915: evaṃ bahulavihāriṇo me apyevāsyānarthasyākriyā syādityevaṃ yoniśaḥ pradadhatsva,
SA20srabhusu:7921: me smṛtisaṃpramoṣādvā, anādarādvā kleśapracuratayā vā, avyutpannato vāsti kaścicchikṣāvyatikramaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7923: śikṣā[ṃ] yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtyādhyāśayena ca punarakaraṇāya cittamutpāditaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7930: sa cetpariśuddhaḥ śīlaskandhaḥ, na punaste cetanā karaṇīyā /
SA20srabhusu:7933: evaṃ cāvipratisāriṇā na cetanā karaṇīyā, kaccinme prāmodyaṃ utpadyeta /
SA20srabhusu:7937: sa cet punarbhavasi pūrveṇāparaṃ parīttasyāpi viśeṣādhigame prītirjanayitavyā,
SA20srabhusu:7943: sa cetpunarlābhī bhavati pūrveṇāparaṃ paracittasyāpi viśeṣādhigamasya [/

SA20srabhusu:8513: na saktena nānyatra vyādhigrastenaivātureṇa vyādhimātropaśamāya bhaiṣajyamāptāgamo 'pyeṣaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8520: sa evaṃ kāmānāmaudārikalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvejya yaduta ṣaḍbhirvastubhiḥ prathame dhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati nāstyetatsarvaśa audārikatvaṃ (/
SA20srabhusu:8522: prathame ca dhyāne śāntalakṣaṇamayamucyate lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8525: sa evaṃ kāmānparijñāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yathāvatparyeṣṭau(ṣyau)
SA20srabhusu:8526: dārikaśāntalakṣaṇena śrutaṃ ca cintāṃ ca vyatikrāmyaikāntena bhāvanākāreṇaivādhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8528: bhāvayaṃśca yathā yathā tāmaudārikaśāntatāṃ punaḥ punaradhimucyataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8534: kleśaprahāṇāya ca mārge samutpanne yastadbhagavato manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8545: tasya tathā prahāṇārāmasya bhāvanārāmasya samyakprayuktasya sataḥ kuśalapakṣaprayogopastambhakāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ kleśakarmaparyavasthānaṃ carato vā viharato vā na samudācarati /
SA20srabhusu:8549: tasyāprahīṇatvāt sarveṇa sarvamanuśayasya tannimittaṃ manasi kurvataḥ sevanānimnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8553: na me samyagviraktaṃ vimuktaṃ cittaṃ yaduta kāmebhyaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:8556: ) ya[n]nvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā tasyānuśayasyāśeṣaprahāṇāya bhūyasyā mātrayā prahāṇārāmo vihareyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:8564: tasya pratipakṣaṃ ca bhāvayataḥ kālena kālaṃ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmānsamānasya sarvebhyaḥ kāmāvacarebhyaḥ kleśebhyaścittaṃ visaṃyujyate /
SA20srabhusu:8570: tasya ca samanaskārapratyayaṃ taddhetukaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:8574: ratisaṃgrāhake ca vivekajena prītisukhena kāyaṃ pratiprīṇayati /
SA20srabhusu:8576: kadācit kadācit dhyānavipulatarasaṃmukhībhāvena prayoganiṣṭhāphale punarmanaskāre vartamānasya nāsti kiñcidasyā(sya) bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8579: samaye viviktaiḥ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ paṃcā[ṅ]gamupasampadya viharati /
SA20srabhusu:8583: prahātavyasya ca prahāṇāya prāptavyasya ca prāptaye cittaṃ praṇidhatte /
SA20srabhusu:8584: ādhimokṣikeṇa ca manaskāreṇa prahāṇāya prāptaye ca samyak prayogamārabhate /
SA20srabhusu:8589: prayoganiṣṭhāphalenaiṣāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ bhāvitānāṃ subhāvitānāṃ bhāvanāphalaṃ pratyanubhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8593: yaśca prāvivekyo manaskāraḥ, yaśca prayoganiṣṭho 'yaṃ prātipakṣiko manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8599: evaṃ sati ṣaṭṣu manaskāreṣu catvāro manaskārāḥ pravighnā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8608: avitarkaśca dvitīyadhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ sa lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8612: yaḥ samāhitabhūmiko 'pyugrālambanabhārī tatprathamopanipātitayā cālambane audāriko manojalpaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8619: sarva eva cātītā, anāgatapratyutpannā, hetusamutpannāḥ, pratītyasamutpannāḥ, ākāyikāstāvatkalikāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8621: uparimāṃ bhūmimārabhya duḥkhavihārānugatatvātkuṣṇapakṣyā kāmavivekaprītisukhamevānuśaṃsānugatā bhūmiścaiṣā tādṛśī prakṛtyā yatra sthitasya nityaṃ nityakālaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:8628: sarvaśo nāstyetadaudārikalakṣaṇamavitarkedvitīye dhyāne ityataḥ śāntaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamasyaudārikatvasyāpagamāt /
SA20srabhusu:8629: śeṣo(ṣe) manaskārā dvitīyadhyānasamāpattaye yathā(pi) yogaṃ pūrvavadveditavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:8630: evaṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattaye yathāyogaṃ sapta manaskārā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8631: audārikalakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvāsvadharimāsu bhūmiṣu yāvadākiṃcanyāyatanāt samāsena dvividhaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:8636: yasyā yasyā bhūmervairāgyaṃ karttukāmo bhavatyupariṣṭācca yathāyogaṃ śāntalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:8642: upakleśāḥ kāmahetukā akuśalā dharmāstadyathā kāyaduścaritaṃ, vāgduścaritaṃ, manoduścaritaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:8646: ] savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ kāmavivekaṃ (kaḥ) tasyānantaramutpannaṃ(nnaḥ) /
SA20srabhusu:8658: vyagracāriṇa ālambanādvivecya avyagracāriṇyālambane ekadharmatayā śāntaṃ prasannaṃ cittaṃ pravarttate /
SA20srabhusu:8663: tenāha cetasa ekotībhāvāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vitarkavicāraprahāṇādavitarkamavicāraṃ prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ samādhistasyānantaraṃ taddhetukaṃ taṃtpra(kastatpra)
SA20srabhusu:8665: tenāha samādhijaṃ īpsitāninditārthaprāpteḥ prītau vā doṣadarśanāt /
SA20srabhusu:8667: prītisukhamanupūrveṇa gaṇayato dvitīyaṃ bhavatyevaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvavad veditavyam /
SA20srabhusu:8670: ] [Śbh_Sh_452] tasmiṃśca samaye dvividho 'sya cittakṣobhakaraḥ apakṣālo 'dhigato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8672: dvitīye ca dhyāne vitarkavicārāḥ, etarhi ca prītiḥ, tenāha upekṣako viharati /
SA20srabhusu:8681: nāsti, tena tṛtīye dhyāne upekṣako viharatītyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8683: yathā yathā te prītisahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti /
SA20srabhusu:8684: sa cetpunarabhāvitatvāt tṛtīyasya dhyānasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣātkadācitkarhicit citte prītisahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti /
SA20srabhusu:8691: tasya tasminsamaye evamupekṣakasya viharatā smṛtasya saṃprajanya syāsevanānvayādbahulīkārānvayātprītisahagataṃ prahīyate /
SA20srabhusu:8692: taccittauddhatyakaraṃ, niḥprītikaṃ, śāntaṃ, praśāntaṃ cetasi veditamutpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:8694: manaḥkāyena vedita sukhaṃ ca praśrabdhisukhaṃ pratisamvedayate /
SA20srabhusu:8696: adhastadrūpaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti nāpi nirantarā upekṣā tṛtīyā[d]dhyānādūrdhvaṃ yadapyupekṣopalabhyate /
SA20srabhusu:8699: idaṃ tadāyatanaṃ yaduta tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yattadāryā ācakṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8701: sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharatīti āryāḥ punaḥ vṛddhāśca vṛddhaśrāvakāśca /
SA20srabhusu:8707: tasya ca niṣevaṇābhyāsāttṛtīyadhyānāccalito yatra [Śbh_Sh_454] tṛtīyadhyānabhūmisukhaṃ tatprajahāti /
SA20srabhusu:8710: tatra caturthadhyānasamāpattikāle tasmin samaye sa dhyāyī sukhaduḥkhavyatikramamanuprāpnoti /
SA20srabhusu:8713: sukhasya ca prahāṇāt(d), duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt, pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorasta[ṅ]gamāt /
SA20srabhusu:8714: tanna caturthadhyānasamāpattikāle sukhasya ca prahāṇāaddvitīyadhyānasamāpattikāle duḥkhasya,
SA20srabhusu:8720: aduḥkhāsukhā tasmin samaye prathamaṃ dhyānamupādāya sarve adhobhūmikāḥ apakṣālāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:8730: tatrākāśādhimokṣasya varṇasaṃjñā nīlapītalohitāvadātādipratisaṃyuktatāmasātāmasātayā nirvirāgatayā ca samatikrānto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8732: rūpasaṃjñānāṃ [Śbh_Sh_456] samatikramādanābhāsagamanahetoryā anekavidhā bahunānāprakārā varṇapracayahetukā āvaraṇasaṃjñā sā (yā)
SA20srabhusu:8736: tāsāmvā punarvigamahetoryā aupacayikīsaṃjñāsteṣvavaśiṣṭeṣu viśiṣṭeṣu saṃghāteṣu pravṛttāstadyathā bhojanapānavastrālaṃkāragṛhodyānavanasenāparvatādisaṃjñā[ḥ] /
SA20srabhusu:8740: sa evaṃ rūpapratighanānātvasaṃjñā bhāvayitvā anantākāreṇākāśādhimukto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8747: tasyākāśamālambanaṃ samāpannasya punastacca tadanye ca skandhāḥ svabhūmikāḥ sāmantake punaradhobhūmikā api skandhāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8760: sa vijñānānantyāyatanāduccalito vijñānāt pareṇālambanaṃ samanveṣamāṇo na punarlabhate (/
SA20srabhusu:8761: ) kiñcana pratisaṃyuktaṃ rūpi vā, arūpi vā [/
SA20srabhusu:8762: ] sa tadālambanamalabhamānaḥ sasāmāntakamaulaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ [sa]matikramya nāsti kiñcidanyadā lambanamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8764: sa tasya saṃjñādhimokṣasya bahulīkārānvayādākiṃcanyāyatanasāmantakaṃ samatikramya yāvatprayoganiṣṭhā(n)
SA20srabhusu:8767: sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiñcidityākiñcanyāyatanamupasaṃspṛśya (-sampadya) viharatīti /
SA20srabhusu:8777: na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sāsya saṃjñā niruddhā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8778: tadyathā āsaṃjñi[ke]vā, nirodhasamāpattau vā, nānyatra sūkṣmā sā saṃjñā nimittālambane pravartate /
SA20srabhusu:8780_0: ] evaṃ tadāyatanādhimuktaḥ sasāmantakamaulamākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasāmantakasya
SA20srabhusu:8782: sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatana[ṃ] samatikramya naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamupasampadya viharatīti //
SA20srabhusu:8788: [Śbh_Sh_459] tatrāsaṃjñāsamāpatti[ṃ] saṃjñāvimukhena manaskāreṇa pṛthagjana eva samāpadyate,
SA20srabhusu:8790: tatra dvābhyāṃ manaskārābhyāmanayoḥ samāpattyoḥ samāpattipraveśo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8797: samanaskārasamāpannasya ca punaścittaṃ na pravartata iti /
SA20srabhusu:8798: sa evaṃ niḥsaraṇasaṃjñā pūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa śubhakṛtyavītarāgasya,
SA20srabhusu:8802: tatra naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanalābhī āryaḥ pareṇa śāntena vihāreṇa viharttukāmaḥ naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanāccittamuccā layati /
SA20srabhusu:8806_0: ya evamākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śaikṣasyārhato vā vihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa
SA20srabhusu:8806_1: cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodha iyamucyate nirodhasamāpattirevaṃ ca punarasyāḥ prāptirbhavati //
SA20srabhusu:8815: pūrvenivāsadivyaśrotracyutyupapādacetaḥ paryāyamvā tameva manasi kurvan samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇārthapratisaṃvedī ca bhavati /

SA20srabhusu:8840: tatrākāśadhātusaṃjñā yayā saṃjñayā laghutāṃ ca mṛdutāṃ cātmano 'dhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8842: tatra yadantarālaṃ vivandhacaraṃ rūpigataṃ gamanāya tadākāśamadhimucyate [/
SA20srabhusu:8844: tatra cittakāyasamavadhānasaṃjñā yayā cittamvā kāye samavadadhāti /
SA20srabhusu:8858: vistareṇa tathānirmitaṃ cādhimucyate, rūpanirmitaṃ vā, śabdanirmitaṃ vā [/]
SA20srabhusu:8859: ityābhiḥ pañcasaṃjñābhiḥ bhāvanāyā pariniṣpannābhiranekavidhamṛddhiṣayaṃ pratyanubhavatyeko bhūtvā bahudhātmānamupadarśayati /
SA20srabhusu:8869: tadyathā pakṣī śakuni[ḥ], imau vā sūryācandramasāvevaṃ mahardhikau mahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi /
SA20srabhusu:8874: tatra dvividhābrahmalokasya kāyena vaśe vartanā, gamanena ca (/
SA20srabhusu:8876: yathaivādhimuktyā vā, brahmalokādadhaścartukāmatā bhūtānāṃ tadekatyasya copādāyarūpasya [/]
SA20srabhusu:8877: tatra pūrvānubhūtacaritānukramānusmṛtisaṃjñā yayā kumārakabhāvamupādāya yatrāsya smṛtiḥ pravarttate /
SA20srabhusu:8881: [Śbh_Sh_465] śayito vistareṇa sarvāṃ pūrvānubhūtāṃ caryāmaudāraudārikaudārikatayā anuparivāṭikayā avyutkramanti(nte) /
SA20srabhusu:8883: tasyā bhāvanānvayād bhāvanāphalamanekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati yāvatsansā(saṃsā)
SA20srabhusu:8892: nānāprakārasya janakāyasya sanniṣaṇṇasya sannipatitasya yo vyatimiśro,
SA20srabhusu:8897: tatra nimittamudgṛhya yā saṃjñābhāvanā yayā samāhitabhūmikena manasikāreṇāryānāryeṣu śabdeṣu,
SA20srabhusu:8900: tasyāsya bahulīkārānvayād bhāvanāphalaṃ divyaṃ śrotraṃ pratilabhate /
SA20srabhusu:8907: yena divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena vistareṇa yāvatkāyasya bhedātsvargatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante(te) /
SA20srabhusu:8920: tadyathā mūkatā arthanidhyaptāvapratipadyanatā (danatā) prākṛtāprākṛtā vā vāgvyāhāratā [/
SA20srabhusu:8925: yena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ vitarkitaṃ vicāritaṃ mano manasā yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20srabhusu:8939: anāryayā na punarna tathaiva bhavatyapi tu /
SA20srabhusu:8941: evamābhirdvādaśabhiḥ saṃjñābhirbahulīkārānvayādyathāyogaṃ sa pañcānāmabhijñānāmāryāṇāṃ ca guṇānāmapṛthagjanasandhāraṇānāṃ yathāyogamabhinirhāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8942: tatra prathame dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātraparibhāvitena yathāyogaṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ,
SA20srabhusu:8945: ] dvitīye dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhāvite yathāyogaṃ parīttānāmābhāsvarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupasaṃpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:8952: sa cetpunaranāgāmī anāsraveṇa dhyānena caturthena sāsravaṃ, vyavakīrṇaṃ [Śbh_Sh_469] bhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:8958: ] arūpiṇaśca devāstasmātteṣāṃ sthānāntarakṛto bhedo nāsti, vihārakṛtastu viśeṣo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8967: ] na saṃgaṇikārāmo, na saṃsargārāmo, dhīrā cāsya vāg(k)pravartate /
SA20srabhusu:8976: ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni vītarāgaliṃgāni veditavyānītyayaṃ tāvat laukikamārgagamanasya vibhāgaḥ //
SA20srabhusu:8977: atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa gantukāmo bhavati tasya catvāryāryasatyānyārabhya sapta manaskārā anupūrveṇotpadyante /
SA20srabhusu:8984: caturbhirākāraiḥ samudayasatyasya tadyathā hetutaḥ, samudayataḥ, prabhavataḥ, pratyayataśca [/
SA20srabhusu:8999: ] te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ samāsataḥ sattvalokaśca bhājanalokaśca //
SA20srabhusu:9003: divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa satvāṃścyavamānāṃścotpadyamānāṃśca [Śbh_Sh_472] vistareṇa yāvat kāsasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante /
SA20srabhusu:9004: ityanena tāvatparyāyeṇa ityanena tāvatparyāyeṇa bhagavatā cakṣuṣmatā pratyakṣadarśinā sattvalokasyānityatā vyākhyātā /
SA20srabhusu:9008: sa samayo yaddīrghasyādhvano 'tyayādanupūrveṇa yāvatsaptānāṃ sūryāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9010: yāvadasyāḥ khalu mahāpṛthivyāḥ sumerośca parvata rājasya /
SA20srabhusu:9011: yāvacca brahmalokād bhājanalokasya dagdhasya dhmātasya maṣirapi na prajñāyate /
SA20srabhusu:9015: tāvadāptāgamaṃ niśrityāyaṃ yogī śraddhādhipateyaṃ sarvasaṃskārānityatāyāṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhate //
SA20srabhusu:9026: bāhyamvastu (sa evaṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhya śraddhādhipatyena punaḥ punaḥ pratyavekṣatāmaviparokṣatāmaparapratyayatā(ṃ)
SA20srabhusu:9046: , [kṛṣikṛtaḥ], maraṇakṛto, vinīlakādi kṛtaḥ, sarveṇa sarvamasaṃprakhyānaparikṣayakṛto vipariṇāmaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9057: tatra kālaparivāso nāma yeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ rūpiṇāṃ svasthāne 'pyupanyastakānāṃ kālāntareṇa jarjarato palabhyate /
SA20srabhusu:9059: tatra paropakramo nāma yathāpi tat paro vividhāni rūpāṇi vividhaiḥ praharaṇaiḥ vividhairupakramaviśeṣaiḥ vicitrāṃ vikṛtimāpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:9060: tatropabhogo nāma yathāpi tatpratisvāmino vividhaṃ rūpamupabhuṃjānā upabhogavidhipatitvā (gamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā vi)kṛtimāpādayanti /
SA20srabhusu:9061: tatra ṛtuvipariṇāmo nāma tadyathā hemante tṛṇauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ, śīrṇatvaṃ prajāyate /
SA20srabhusu:9063: tathā phalasamṛddhiḥ, puṣpasamṛddhiḥ, patrasamṛddhiḥ, vipattiśca teṣāmeva [/]

SA20srabhusu:9589: tatra ye pratilabdhā, na ca saṃmukhībhūtāste tajjātīyairdharmairniṣevyamāṇau(ṇai)
SA20srabhusu:9600: śalyato, gaṇḍataḥ, aghataḥ, anityato, duḥkhataḥ, śūnyato, [a]nātmataśca parijānāti /
SA20srabhusu:9606: tathā tathā adhobhūmikāḥ prahāṇādharmā dūrī bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:9620: tatra lokottaramārgabhāvanā duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvataḥ,
SA20srabhusu:9624: tatra madhyamārgabhāvanā yayā madhyān kleśān prajahāti /
SA20srabhusu:9627: tatra prayogamārgabhāvanā yayā prayogamārabhate kleśa prahāṇāya /
SA20srabhusu:9629: [Śbh_Sh_506] tatra vimuktimārgabhāvanā yayā samanantaraprahīṇe kleśavimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA20srabhusu:9634: tasyaivaṃ bhāvanāprayuktasya kālena ca kālaṃ kleśānāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmānsa(māṃsa)
SA20srabhusu:9636: kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayataḥ,
SA20srabhusu:9638: tasyāsya ratisaṃgrāhakasya manaskārasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayādbahulīkārānvayānniravaśeṣabhāvanāprahātavyā[ḥ] kleśaprahāṇāya sarvapaścimaḥ śaikṣo vajropamaḥ samādhirutpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:9644: evamevāyaṃ samādhiḥ sarvaśaikṣasamādhīnāmagryaḥ, śreṣṭhaḥ sarvasāraḥ sarvakleśānabhibhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9647: tasya vajropamasya samādheḥ samanantaraṃ sarvakleśapakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyabījasamuddhātādatyantatāyai cittamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:9656: aśaikṣayā samyagdṛṣṭyā samyaksaṃkalpena yāvadaśaikṣayā samyagvimuktyā samyagjñānena [/
SA20srabhusu:9660: vihāreṇāryeṇa vā, divyena vā, brāhmeṇa vā, tena tena viharati /
SA20srabhusu:9661: yaṃ yamevākāṃkṣate dharmaṃ manasi karttuṃ kuśalamarthopasaṃhitaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:9662: laukikaṃ vā lokottaramvā, taṃ tameva manasi karoti /
SA20srabhusu:9672: kta cittaḥ, suvimuktaprajñaḥ kevalo ukṣi..........cca...........li puruṣa ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:9675: bhavati suṣṭhumanāḥ upekṣako bhavati smṛtaḥ samprajā[nā]naḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9676: evaṃ śrotreṇa śabdān, ghrāṇena gandhān, jihvayā rasān, kāyena spraṣṭavyān, manasā dharmān vijñāya /
SA20srabhusu:9681: samacittaśca bhavati vāsī candanakalpaḥ sendro pitryāṇāṃ devānāṃ mānyaśca pūjyaśca mārgakāśeṣadhātupratiṣṭhite ca bhavati tīrṇaḥ pāragato 'ntimādehadhārītyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:9682: pūrvakarmakleśāviddhānāṃ pañca skandhānāṃ svarasaṃ..........nānu pādānāt vā,
SA20srabhusu:9686: nānyatra yad duḥkhaṃ tanniruddhaṃ tavyupaśāntaṃ tacchītībhūtaṃ bhava iṃ gataṃ /
SA20srabhusu:9688: yaduta sarvopadhipratiniḥsarvasaṃjñākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇaṃ tasyemāni liṃgānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:9692: prāpayituṃ mandadā tra ma brahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratiṣevituṃ /
SA20srabhusu:9694: tathā bhavyaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyetuṃ /
